app.name: Email Knowledge Base
app.tagline: One Platform. All Your Knowledge. Ready for AI

hero.title: Reclaim Your Time from Routine Email Tasks
hero.description: Office workers spend over 50% of their time on repetitive email communications. Our platform extracts valuable knowledge from your emails, enabling AI to handle routine tasks with personalized tone and clarity.

smartEmailProcessing.title: Smart Email Processing
smartEmailProcessing.description: Filter and process emails intelligently based on content, sender, and importance.

aiPoweredKnowledgeExtraction.title: AI-Powered Knowledge Extraction
aiPoweredKnowledgeExtraction.description: Extract valuable insights and patterns from your communications using advanced AI algorithms.

centralizedKnowledgeBase.title: Centralized Knowledge Base
centralizedKnowledgeBase.description: Store all extracted knowledge in a searchable, organized database for easy access.

enterpriseGradeSecurity.title: Enterprise-Grade Security
enterpriseGradeSecurity.description: Protect sensitive information with advanced security measures and compliance protocols.

aiAssistantTraining.title: AI Assistant Training
aiAssistantTraining.description: Train AI assistants with your knowledge base to handle routine communications effectively.

powerfulSearchCapabilities.title: Powerful Search Capabilities
powerfulSearchCapabilities.description: Find exactly what you need with advanced semantic search and filtering options.

streamlinedEmployeeSupport.title: Streamlined Employee Support
streamlinedEmployeeSupport.description: Automate responses to common HR inquiries and maintain consistent communication with employees.

efficientOfficeManagement.title: Efficient Office Management
efficientOfficeManagement.description: Organize administrative communications and automate routine office management tasks.

consistentFinancialCommunication.title: Consistent Financial Communication
consistentFinancialCommunication.description: Ensure accurate and consistent financial messaging across all departments and stakeholders.

enhancedClientCommunication.title: Enhanced Client Communication
enhancedClientCommunication.description: Improve client relationships with personalized and timely responses to inquiries.

clientKnowledgePreservation.title: Client Knowledge Preservation
clientKnowledgePreservation.description: Preserve institutional knowledge about clients even as team members change roles.

structuredDealRecords.title: Structured Deal Records
structuredDealRecords.description: Maintain comprehensive records of financial transactions and client interactions.

footer.copyright: Email Knowledge Base. All rights reserved.

documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.description: Welcome to the Email Knowledge Base documentation. Here you'll find detailed information about all aspects of our platform.
documentation.exploreText: Explore comprehensive documentation covering all aspects of our platform, from authentication to knowledge export.

authentication.title: Secure Authentication
authentication.description: Learn about our OAuth2-based authentication system that integrates seamlessly with Microsoft 365.

filtering.title: Smart Email Processing
filtering.description: Automatically filter and categorize emails based on content, priority, and knowledge value.
filtering.folderDescription: Organize content hierarchically by department, project, or category
filtering.dateRangeDescription: Filter by specific time periods (last week, month, custom range)
filtering.senderRecipientDescription: Filter by specific contacts or domains
filtering.keywordSearchDescription: Find emails containing specific terms or phrases
filtering.attachmentTypeDescription: Filter by emails with specific attachment types (.pdf, .docx, etc.)
filtering.importanceDescription: Filter by priority flags or importance markers
filtering.alert: Filters can be combined to create highly specific queries, allowing you to target exactly the content you need.
filtering.advancedQuerySyntaxDescription: For more complex searches, you can use the advanced query syntax:
filtering.advancedQuerySyntaxNote: This example searches for emails in the inbox folder that are either from john@example.com or have "important" in the subject.

bestPractice1.title: Start with specific folders:
bestPractice1.description: Begin by filtering emails from relevant project or topic-specific folders.

bestPractice2.title: Use date ranges wisely:
bestPractice2.description: Narrow down your search to specific time periods relevant to your knowledge base topic.

bestPractice3.title: Save filter templates:
bestPractice3.description: Create and save templates for commonly used filter combinations to save time.

bestPractice4.title: Process in batches:
bestPractice4.description: Select and process related emails together for more coherent knowledge extraction.

bestPractice5.title: Focus on high importance:
bestPractice5.description: Start with high-importance emails as they often contain critical information.

filtering.workflowStep1Description: Choose the filter types most relevant to your knowledge needs
filtering.workflowStep2Description: Use the selected filters to narrow down your email collection
filtering.workflowStep3Description: Analyze initial results and adjust filters to improve precision
filtering.workflowStep4Description: Store successful filter combinations as templates for future use
filtering.useCase1Description: Capture all project-related communications for future reference and onboarding
filtering.useCase2Description: Build comprehensive profiles of client preferences, history, and requirements
filtering.useCase3Description: Preserve technical solutions, workarounds, and troubleshooting steps
filtering.filterTip3Description: Limit searches to relevant time periods to improve performance
filtering.filterTip4Description: Filter by important senders or recipients to prioritize valuable communications
filtering.subject: Subject
filtering.filterTip1Description: Use multiple filters together to narrow down results more precisely
filtering.filterTip2Description: Filter by tags to quickly find content with specific classifications

analysis.title: AI Analysis
analysis.description: Understand how our AI analyzes and extracts knowledge from your communications.

classification.title: Smart Classification
classification.description: Automatically categorizes emails by department, topic, and importance

pii.title: PII Detection
pii.description: Identifies and flags personally identifiable information for review

summarization.title: Content Summarization
summarization.description: Creates concise summaries of email threads and conversations

sensitivity.title: Sensitivity Analysis
sensitivity.description: Evaluates content for confidentiality and compliance concerns

extraction.title: Knowledge Extraction
extraction.description: Identifies key facts, decisions, and actionable insights

analysis.info: Our AI models are fine-tuned for business communications and can be customized for your organization's specific terminology and needs.

step1.title: Initial Content Scan
step1.description: Emails are processed to extract text, metadata, and attachment information

step2.title: PII & Sensitive Data Detection
step2.description: AI identifies personal information, confidential data, and compliance concerns

step3.title: Classification & Tagging
step3.description: Content is categorized by department, topic, priority, and knowledge value

step4.title: Knowledge Extraction
step4.description: Key facts, decisions, and insights are identified and structured

step5.title: Human Review Preparation
step5.description: Results are formatted for efficient human review and approval

analysis.warning: AI analysis is designed to assist human reviewers, not replace them. All AI-generated tags and classifications can be modified during review.

department.title: Department
department.description: Identifies which business unit the content relates to

type.title: Content Type
type.description: Categorizes the nature of the information

pii.title: PII & Sensitive Data Detection
pii.description: Our AI system automatically identifies and flags personally identifiable information and sensitive data to ensure compliance with privacy regulations and company policies.
pii.success: All flagged PII is presented for human review before being processed. You can choose to redact, anonymize, or approve each instance.

knowledgeBase.title: Knowledge Base
knowledgeBase.subtitle: Powerful vector database for storing, searching, and exporting your organization's knowledge.
knowledgeBase.description: Learn how to search, manage, and export your organization's knowledge repository.
knowledgeBase.managementDescription: Our Knowledge Base provides a structured repository for your organization's valuable information, enabling you to easily store, search, and export knowledge extracted from communications.
knowledgeBase.relationshipKnowledgeDescription: Connections between people, topics, and content
knowledgeBase.semanticSearchDescription: Find information based on meaning and context, not just exact keyword matches
knowledgeBase.semanticSearchExample: Example: Show all discussions about Q3 budget planning
knowledgeBase.relationshipSearchDescription: Discover connections between people and topics
knowledgeBase.relationshipSearchExample: Example: Who was involved in the website redesign project?
knowledgeBase.trendAnalysisDescription: Identify patterns and trends over time
knowledgeBase.trendAnalysisExample: Example: How has customer feedback evolved over the past 6 months?
knowledgeBase.permissionBasedAccessDescription: Filter results based on user permissions
knowledgeBase.permissionBasedAccessExample: Example: Show only knowledge from departments I have access to
knowledgeBase.exportOptionsDescription: Knowledge can be exported in multiple formats for integration with other systems or for offline reference.
knowledgeBase.customExportFormatsInfo: Custom export formats can be configured for enterprise customers to match your existing systems.
knowledgeBase.apiAccessDescription: Integrate Knowledge Base capabilities directly into your applications using our comprehensive API.

aiTraining.subtitle: Learn how to effectively train AI models using your email knowledge base
aiTraining.overviewDescription: Our AI training system allows you to create custom AI models that understand your organization's communication patterns and knowledge base.

capability1.title: Knowledge Integration
capability1.description: Seamlessly integrate extracted email knowledge into AI training datasets

capability2.title: Custom Training
capability2.description: Train AI models with your organization's specific communication style and domain knowledge

capability3.title: Multilingual Support
capability3.description: Train AI models to handle communications in multiple languages effectively

capability4.title: Performance Analytics
capability4.description: Monitor and optimize AI model performance with detailed analytics

step1.description: Select and prepare relevant email data for training

step2.title: Model Configuration
step2.description: Configure AI model parameters and training objectives

step4.title: Performance Evaluation
step4.description: Evaluate model performance and make necessary adjustments

step5.title: Deployment
step5.description: Deploy trained models to handle live communications

useCase1.description: Train AI to handle common customer inquiries and support requests

useCase2.title: Internal Communication
useCase2.description: Automate routine internal communications and knowledge sharing

useCase3.description: Process and categorize incoming documents and attachments

useCase4.title: Knowledge Distribution
useCase4.description: Distribute relevant knowledge to appropriate team members

practice1.title: Data Quality
practice1.description: Ensure training data is clean, relevant, and representative

practice2.title: Regular Updates
practice2.description: Continuously update models with new knowledge and patterns

practice3.title: Performance Monitoring
practice3.description: Regularly monitor and evaluate model performance

practice4.title: Feedback Integration
practice4.description: Incorporate user feedback into model improvements

metric1.title: Response Accuracy
metric1.description: Percentage of queries correctly resolved by the AI model

metric2.title: Resolution Rate
metric2.description: Percentage of queries resolved without human intervention

metric3.title: Average Response Time
metric3.description: Time taken to generate and deliver responses

metric4.title: User Satisfaction
metric4.description: User feedback ratings for AI interactions

option1.title: Email Integration
option1.description: Connect AI models to email systems for processing incoming messages

option2.title: Chat Platforms
option2.description: Deploy AI models on internal or customer-facing chat interfaces

option3.title: Knowledge Base Frontend
option3.description: Embed AI capabilities directly in knowledge base interface

option4.title: API Access
option4.description: Connect AI models to custom applications via our API

emailProcessing.title: Email Processing
emailProcessing.subtitle: Efficiently filter, select, and process emails for your knowledge base
emailProcessing.description: The Email Processing feature allows you to intelligently filter through your email archive, select relevant messages, and process them for inclusion in your knowledge base. This streamlined workflow helps you extract valuable information from your email communications and transform it into structured knowledge.
emailProcessing.infoAlert: Email processing is the first step in building your knowledge base. After selecting and processing emails, you'll be able to review the extracted information before it's added to your knowledge base.

feature1.title: Advanced Filtering
feature1.description: Filter emails by folder, date range, sender, keywords, importance, and attachment types to quickly find relevant messages.

feature2.title: Filter Templates
feature2.description: Save and reuse your filter configurations as templates for consistent processing of similar email types.

feature3.title: Intelligent Search
feature3.description: Use advanced query syntax to perform complex searches across your email archive.

feature4.title: Importance Filtering
feature4.description: Focus on high-priority emails by filtering based on importance levels.

feature5.title: Attachment Handling
feature5.description: Filter emails with specific attachment types or focus only on emails with attachments.

feature6.title: Bulk Processing
feature6.description: Select and process multiple emails simultaneously for efficient knowledge extraction.

step1.title: Set Up Filters
step1.description: Configure filters to narrow down your email search based on folders, date ranges, senders, keywords, and more.

step2.title: Search Emails
step2.description: Execute your search to find emails matching your filter criteria.

step3.title: Select Relevant Emails
step3.description: Review the search results and select the emails you want to process for your knowledge base.

step4.title: Process Selected Emails
step4.description: Submit the selected emails for analysis, which will extract key information and prepare it for review.

step5.title: Review Extracted Information
step5.description: After processing, you'll be directed to the review page where you can verify and refine the extracted information.

filterOption1.title: Folder
filterOption1.description: Select specific email folders to search within

filterOption2.description: Filter emails by start and end dates

filterOption3.title: Sender
filterOption3.description: Filter by specific email addresses or domains

filterOption4.title: Keywords
filterOption4.description: Search for specific words in email subject or body

filterOption5.title: Importance
filterOption5.description: Filter by email importance (high, normal, low)

filterOption6.title: Attachments
filterOption6.description: Filter by presence of attachments or specific types

bestPractice4.description: Select and process related emails together for more coherent knowledge extraction.

bestPractice5.description: Start with high-importance emails as they often contain critical information.

secureAuthentication.title: Enterprise-Grade Security
secureAuthentication.subtitle: Protect your sensitive information with our robust security infrastructure and compliance measures.
secureAuthentication.heading: Secure Authentication
secureAuthentication.description: Our platform uses enterprise-grade security protocols to ensure your email data is protected while providing seamless access for authorized users.
secureAuthentication.oauth2Description: Industry-standard authorization framework that enables secure access without sharing passwords.
secureAuthentication.microsoftIdentityDescription: Integration with Microsoft's authentication services for Outlook access.
secureAuthentication.tokenBasedAuthenticationDescription: Uses secure tokens with limited lifespans instead of persistent credentials.
secureAuthentication.permissionScopingDescription: Only requests specific permissions needed (read-only by default).
secureAuthentication.authenticationInfo: All authentication is handled through Microsoft's secure login page - we never see or store your password.
secureAuthentication.userReadDescription: Sign in and read user profile
secureAuthentication.endToEndEncryptionDescription: All data encrypted in transit using TLS 1.2+ protocols
secureAuthentication.tokenRefreshManagementDescription: Secure handling of refresh tokens with automatic rotation
secureAuthentication.roleBasedAccessControlDescription: Granular permissions based on user roles within the organization
secureAuthentication.automaticSessionTimeoutsDescription: Sessions expire after periods of inactivity for added security
secureAuthentication.enterpriseDeploymentsInfo: For enterprise deployments, we support custom security policies and SSO integrations.
secureAuthentication.authenticationFlowStep1: 1. User initiates login → App redirects to Microsoft login page
secureAuthentication.authenticationFlowStep3: 3. Microsoft validates credentials and requests permission consent
secureAuthentication.authenticationFlowStep4: 4. User grants consent → Microsoft issues authorization code
secureAuthentication.authenticationFlowStep5: 5. App exchanges code for access token and refresh token
secureAuthentication.authenticationFlowStep6: 6. App uses access token to request email data from Microsoft Graph API
secureAuthentication.faq1Title: Can the app read all of my emails?
secureAuthentication.faq1Description: The app only accesses emails that match your specified filters. By default, it only requests read-only permission to your mailbox.
secureAuthentication.faq2Title: What happens if I revoke access?
secureAuthentication.faq2Description: You can revoke access at any time through your Microsoft account settings. This will immediately block the app from accessing any new data.
secureAuthentication.faq3Title: Does the app store my Microsoft password?
secureAuthentication.faq3Description: No. Authentication is handled entirely by Microsoft's identity platform. We never see, access, or store your password.
secureAuthentication.faq4Title: How long do access tokens last?
secureAuthentication.faq4Description: Access tokens typically expire after 1 hour. The app securely manages refresh tokens to maintain access without requiring you to log in again.

signIn.title: Sign in to Email Knowledge Base
signIn.description: Enter your email address and password to access your account

highlights.title: Seamless Enterprise Data Integration
highlights.description: Connects natively to Outlook, SharePoint, AWS S3, Azure Blob, and more — enabling you to extract insights from the silos where information lives.

highlights.title: AI-Ready Knowledge Base, Instantly
highlights.description: Transforms raw emails, documents, and files into structured, queryable knowledge. With just a Microsoft sign-in, you can activate AI-powered discovery — starting with your own inbox.

highlights.title: Built-In Enterprise AI Assistant
highlights.description: Access your knowledge through a smart AI assistant, "Jarvis" — trained on your enterprise data, ready to assist in real-time with context-aware answers.

highlights.title: Secure Sharing with Fine-Grained Control
highlights.description: Easily generate and manage access tokens with clear sensitivity labels and expiry controls — ensuring secure collaboration across teams and partners.

highlights.title: Full Auditability and Usage Visibility
highlights.description: Track exactly how your knowledge is being accessed and used — bringing transparency, control, and governance to your AI initiatives.

highlights.title: From ETL to Enterprise Activation
highlights.description: This isn't just data ingestion. It's about activating knowledge for decision-making, productivity, and scalable AI automation — all from a single unified platform.
